net.edudb.expression

Class BinaryExpressionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edudb.ebtree.EBTree
      • net.edudb.expression.BinaryExpressionTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExpressionTree, OperatorParameter

    public class BinaryExpressionTree
extends EBTree
implements ExpressionTree
    A tree that consists of binary expression nodes. Used for expression trees that are evaluated against records.
    Author:
    Ahmed Abdul Badie

    • Method Detail

      • addNode

        public void addNode(EBNode node)
        Description copied from class: EBTree
        Adds a node to the tree using bottom-up approach. The root is given a parent and then the new parent becomes the root. If the new node is a binary node, the root becomes the node's left child.
        Specified by:
        addNode in class EBTree
        Parameters:
        node - The node to add.

      • evaluate

        public boolean evaluate(java.util.LinkedHashMap<Column,DataType> data)
        Description copied from interface: ExpressionTree
        Evaluates an expression against a record.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface ExpressionTree
        Parameters:
        data - The record for the expression to be evaluated against.
        Returns:
        Result of the evaluation.
